duties_responsibilities.duty: Sell supplemental insurance products and services in a defined sales territory with an existing customer base.
Develop specific, needs-based sales recommendations for clients, highlighting the benefits of the company's insurance products.
Consult with current customers to provide value and meet their financial needs.
Build strong, long-term relationships with school districts and teaching associations.
Develop customized needs-based employee benefit packages through annual benefit enrollments and group presentations.
Focus on growing and maintaining existing K-12 school accounts through one-on-one sales.
Participate in a structured, comprehensive training program including on-the-job training within the territory, Product and Sales Schools, and online training.
Consistent six-figure income opportunity within 3-5 years.

education_certification.credential: 60 hours of college education or associates degree preferred
